definition: reign name of Ming emperor (1573-1619)
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
see 万俟[Mo4 qi2]

sentences.english: The Wan-li period is a critical period for the Ming Dynasty's collapse.
sentences.chinese: 明万历时期是明王朝走向崩溃的一个重要时期。

sentences.english: Wanli emperor decided was conferring the king of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 万历帝决定册封丰臣秀吉为日本国王。

sentences.english: Content: In the Wan-li times' literary world of the Ming Dynasty, Li Wei-zhenwas characteristic of special status.
sentences.chinese: 在明万历年间的文坛上，李维桢有着独特的地位。

sentences.english: As the story goes that Huang Jiashan and Zhou Rudi had studied at here in Ming Dynasty Wan Li years (about 1550-1615).
sentences.chinese: 传说，明朝万历年间，黄嘉善和周如砥在这里读书。

sentences.english: The Ding Mausoleum is a tomb of Emperor Wanli (Ming Dynasty) and his two empresses.
sentences.chinese: 定陵是明代万历皇帝及其两皇后的陵墓。

sentences.english: Five-colored basin with Human figure design in various scenes, Wanli Era of Ming Dynasty, excavated from Andingmen, Dongcheng District, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 景德镇窑五彩人物故事图盆，明万历年，安定门出土。

sentences.english: This study discusses love writing and reading for "Ancient China Brothel" during the late Wan-Li of the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本篇论文以万历后期青楼的情爱书写与阅读为中心。

sentences.english: During the late Wanli era, the situation of illegal trade with Japan was severer than that of the Jiajing period.
sentences.chinese: 万历后期的违禁通番贸易，较之嘉靖后期更盛。

sentences.english: Ming Wanli due to transfer all Dongguan Xiang Mu Hong Kong has only one said.
sentences.chinese: 明万历年间因转运东莞所有香木始有香港一称。

definition: Chongzhen, reign name of last Ming emperor (1628-1644)
Hongzhi Emperor, reign name of ninth Ming emperor 朱祐樘[Zhu1 You4 tang2] (1470-1505), reigned 1487-1505, Temple name 明孝宗[Ming2 Xiao4 zong1]
Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name 明太祖[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)
Zhengde Emperor, reign name of eleventh Ming emperor Zhu Houzhao 朱厚照[Zhu1 Hou4 zhao4] (1491-1521), reigned 1505-1521, Temple name 明武宗[Ming2 Wu3 zong1]
Jiaqing Emperor (1760-1820), seventh Qing emperor, personal name 顒琰|颙琰[Yong2 yan3], reigned 1796-1820
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)
tomorrow morning/the following morning
Xuande Emperor, reign name of fifth Ming emperor Zhu Zhanji 朱瞻基[Zhu1 Zhan1 ji1] (1398-1435), reigned 1426-1436, Temple name 明宣宗[Ming2 Xuan1 zong1]
Ming Wuzong, temple name of eleventh Ming emperor Zhengde 正德[Zheng4 de2]
Temple name of fifth Ming emperor Xuande 宣德[Xuan1 de2]

Ming Xizong, Temple name of fifteenth Ming emperor Tianqi 明天啟|明天启[Ming2 Tian1 qi3]
